summary: Two outcast brothers, through getting to know their unknown family, discover a horrible truth about themselves and their relatives.
cast: David Dencik|Mads Mikkelsen|Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Søren Malling|Nicolas Bro|Stine Engberg Andersen|Rikke Louise Andersson|Ulla Asbjørn-Damsted|Thor Bisbjerg|Valdemar Bemmann Bredning|Lisbet Dahl|Johnny Didriksen|Matti Ehlers|Daniel Engstrup|Jens Fitzau|Agnes Franch|Anders Hansen|Poul Ib Henriksen|Stig Hoffmeyer|Kim S.G. Jensen|Bodil Jørgensen|Tobias Kowalczyk|Brian Kristiansen|Ingelise Larsen|Kirsten Lehfeldt|Lasse Low|Lars Lunøe|Maj-Britt Mathiesen|Phillip Møller|Birthe Neumann|Kjeld Nørgaard|Jan Petersen|Lars Petersen|Noam Sattrup|Anton Degner Steffen|Noah Stokholm|Kent Theil-Gjersen|Ole Thestrup
title: Mænd & høns
